verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> o-Deh I will praise יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all לֵבָ֑ב <WH3824> le-Vav; with [my] whole heart בְּס֖וֹד <WH5475> be-Sod in the assembly יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> ye-sha-Rim of the upright וְעֵדָֽה׃ <WH5712> ve-'e-Dah. and [in] the congregation

גְּ֭דֹלִים <WH1419> Ge-do-lim [are] great מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei The works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים <WH1875> de-ru-Shim, sought out לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH2656> chef-tzei-Hem. of all them that have pleasure

הוֹד־ <WH1935> hod- [is] honourable וְהָדָ֥ר <WH1926> ve-ha-Dar and glorious פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ <WH6467> po-'o-Lo; His work וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-To, and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> la-'Ad. for ever

זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> Ze-cher to be remembered עָ֭שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah He hath made לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו <WH6381> le-nif-le-'o-Tav; his wonderful works חַנּ֖וּן <WH2587> chan-Nun [is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> ve-ra-Chum and full of compassion יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

טֶ֭רֶף <WH2964> Te-ref meat נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan He hath given לִֽירֵאָ֑יו <WH3373> li-re-'Av; unto them that fear יִזְכֹּ֖ר <WH2142> yiz-Kor be mindful לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam him he will ever בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1285> be-ri-To. of his covenant

כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> Ko-ach the power מַ֭עֲשָׂיו <WH4639> Ma-'a-sav of his works הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> hig-Gid He hath shewed לְעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo; his people לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet that he may give לָ֝הֶ֗ם la-Hem, נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> na-cha-Lat them the heritage גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> go-Yim. of the heathen

מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei The works יָ֭דָיו <WH3027> Ya-dav of his hands אֱמֶ֣ת <WH571> 'e-Met [are] verity וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> u-mish-Pat; and judgment נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים <WH539> ne-'e-ma-Nim, [are] sure כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ <WH6490> pik-ku-Dav. all his commandments

סְמוּכִ֣ים <WH5564> se-mu-Chim They stand fast לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> la-'Ad for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; and ever עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם <WH6213> 'a-su-Yim, [and are] done בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> be-'e-Met in truth וְיָשָֽׁר׃ <WH3477> ve-ya-Shar. and uprightness

פְּד֤וּת׀ <WH6304> pe-Dut redemption שָׁ֘לַ֤ח <WH7971> sha-Lach He sent לְעַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo, unto his people צִוָּֽה־ <WH6680> tziv-vah- he hath commanded לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> be-ri-To; his covenant קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh holy וְנוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> ve-no-Ra and reverend שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <WH8034> she-Mo. [is] his name

רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית <WH7225> re-Shit [is] the beginning חָכְמָ֨ה׀ <WH2451> choch-mah of wisdom יִרְאַ֬ת <WH3374> yir-'At The fear יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD שֵׂ֣כֶל <WH7922> Se-chel understanding ט֭וֹב <WH2896> Tov a good לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol have all עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> 'o-sei-Hem; have all they that do תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8416> te-hil-la-To, [his commandments] his praise עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> la-'Ad. for ever
